name: Project Nebiro
description:
This is not a game, it is just a third person shooter system, feel free to try out and leave any suggestions;

Everything in this project is a work in progress;

Current animations:

Basic movement: Idle, Walk, Run, Jump;

Handgun:  180º x 90º AimOffSet, Shooting, Reload, Reload Gun Out.

Note: I am working in this project to learn more about third person system using the Unity Engine, maybe in the future a game may come out of this, who knows...
